title: 命令方块指令求解
author: 新手勿虐
txt_content:
怎么把自定义村民的交易物品设置为有附魔，介绍和特殊属性的（伤害，速度，怪物追踪什么的）
 还有把怪物的自定义掉落物也设置为有附魔，介绍和特殊属性

replies.author: LBL~
replies.txt_content:
新手勿虐 发表于 2014-9-30 21:13
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 1 replace {EntityId:Zombie,SpawnCount:8,SpawnRange:6,Requi .../setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 1 replace {EntityId:Zombie,SpawnCount:8,SpawnRange:6,RequiredPlayerRange:128,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:266,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:1}]},Count:1},{id:310,Count:1},{id:311,Count:1},{id:315,Count:1},{id:3,Count:1}],DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:4}]}}复制代码

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... hlight=背包编辑
用这个可以设置怪物的刷怪笼
以及怪物属性

replies.author: 新手勿虐
replies.txt_content:
757101202 发表于 2014-9-30 16:53
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-79052-1-1.html基础http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210012-1-2.html进阶
我就是在那找不到才来问的

replies.author: LBL~
replies.txt_content:
用tag连接。
如：
summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ 
{Equipment:[{id:seed}]}复制代码
加上tag：
summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~
{Equipment:[{id:seed,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10}]}}]}复制代码

replies.author: 新手勿虐
replies.txt_content:
LBL~ 发表于 2014-9-30 20:46
用tag连接。
如：

/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 1 replace {EntityId:Zombie,SpawnCount:8,SpawnRange:6,RequiredPlayerRange:128,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:266,Count:1},{id:310,Count:1},{id:311,Count:1},{id:315,Count:1},{id:3,Count:1}],DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:4}]}}   给我个指令，是这个指令的手中物品加上附魔锋利1

replies.author: 新手勿虐
replies.txt_content:
LBL~ 发表于 2014-9-30 20:46
用tag连接。
如：

/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 1 replace {EntityId:Zombie,SpawnCount:8,SpawnRange:6,RequiredPlayerRange:128,Delay:10,MinSpawnDelay:10,MaxSpawnDelay:100,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:266,Count:1},{id:310,Count:1},{id:311,Count:1},{id:315,Count:1},{id:3,Count:1}],DropChances:[1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F,1.0F],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Duration:9999999,Amplifier:4}]}}   给我个指令，是这个指令的手中物品加上附魔锋利1

replies.author: 新手勿虐
replies.txt_content:
LBL~ 发表于 2014-10-1 10:24
谢谢，最佳已给
